samples.instruction: ро░рпЗро╖ройрпН роЕроЯрпНроЯрпИропро┐ро▓рпН рокрпЖропро░рпН роЪрпЗро░рпНроХрпНроХ роОройрпНрой роЪрпЖропрпНро╡родрпБ?
samples.current_output: For birth: Apply at tnpds.gov.in with birth certificate + baby's Aadhaar. For marriage: Marriage certificate + spouse's Aadhaar. Remove old card entry if transferring. Taluk Office verification. Time: 15-30 days.

samples.instruction: PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) eppadi peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: Eligibility: Family without own house, EWS/LIG/MIG. Assistance: Up to тВ╣1.5-2.67 lakhs. Apply: pmay-urban.gov.in / Common Service Center. Documents: Aadhaar, Income certificate, Land document. Interest subsidy on bank loan available.

samples.current_output: Pradhan Mantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana - роХро┐ро░ро╛роо роЪрпБроХро╛родро╛ро░роорпН. Components: Health & Wellness Centres (HWC) - Primary healthcare, Teleconsultation facility. Services: 12 essential services - Maternal care, Child health, Communicable diseases, NCD screening (Diabetes, BP), Mental health, Dental, Eye care. Free: All services free at HWC. Location: Sub-centre/PHC within 30 min travel. Access: Aadhaar/ration card рокрпЛродрпБроорпН, registration required.

guidelines:
GOVERNMENT PACK GUIDELINES:
- Keep website URLs and scheme acronyms in English
- Use Tamil for process steps: ро╡ро┐рогрпНрогрокрпНрокроорпН (application), роЖро╡рогроорпН (document)
- Tamil numbers for amounts when natural
- Format with emoji headers: ЁЯПЫя╕П, ЁЯУЛ, ЁЯТ░
